sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { 
  Box, Typography, Container, Button, Grid, Card, CardContent,
  useTheme, alpha, Stack, Avatar, Divider, IconButton
} from '@mui/material';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { 
  School, MenuBook, Dashboard, Groups,
  TrendingUp, Security, Speed, Cloud,
  ArrowForward, Star, CheckCircle, People,
  CalendarToday, LocationOn, LibraryBooks,
  PlayCircle, GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter
} from '@mui/icons-material';

const HomePage = () => {
  const theme = useTheme();
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  const features = [
    {
      icon: <School />,
      title: 'University Management',
      description: 'Easily manage universities, campuses, and academic programs',
      color: '#3f51b5',
      stats: '50+ Universities'
    },
    {
      icon: <MenuBook />,
      title: 'Course Catalog',
      description: 'Comprehensive course management with detailed descriptions',
      color: '#f50057',
      stats: '500+ Courses'
    },
    {
      icon: <Dashboard />,
      title: 'Analytics Dashboard',
      description: 'Real-time insights and performance metrics',
      color: '#4caf50',
      stats: 'Live Updates'
    },
    {
      icon: <Groups />,
      title: 'Student Management',
      description: 'Track student enrollment and academic progress',
      color: '#ff9800',
      stats: '10K+ Students'
    }
  ];

  const stats = [
    { value: '50+', label: 'Universities', icon: <School />, color: '#3f51b5' },
    { value: '500+', label: 'Courses', icon: <MenuBook />, color: '#f50057' },
    { value: '10K+', label: 'Students', icon: <Groups />, color: '#4caf50' },
    { value: '99%', label: 'Uptime', icon: <CheckCircle />, color: '#ff9800' }
  ];

  const testimonials = [
    {
      name: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson',
      role: 'Dean of Academic Affairs',
      text: 'This platform has revolutionized how we manage our university operations.',
      avatar: 'SJ'
    },
    {
      name: 'Prof. Michael Chen',
      role: 'Department Head',
      text: 'The course management system is intuitive and saves us hours of work.',
      avatar: 'MC'
    },
    {
      name: 'Emma Wilson',
      role: 'System Administrator',
      text: 'Reliable, scalable, and easy to use. Highly recommended!',
      avatar: 'EW'
    }
  ];

  return (
    <Box sx={{ overflow: 'hidden' }}>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          position: 'relative',
          background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${theme.palette.primary.main} 0%, ${theme.palette.primary.dark} 100%)`,
          color: 'white',
          py: { xs: 8, md: 12 },
          overflow: 'hidden'
        }}
      >
        {/* Background Pattern */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            left: 0,
            right: 0,
            bottom: 0,
            backgroundImage: 'radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 20%)',
            opacity: 0.3
          }}
        />
        
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box sx={{ position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }}>
                <Typography 
                  variant="h1" 
                  sx={{ 
                    fontWeight: 800,
                    fontSize: { xs: '2.5rem', md: '3.5rem' },
                    lineHeight: 1.2,
                    mb: 3
                  }}
                >
                  Modern University
                  <Box component="span" sx={{ color: '#ffd740', display: 'block' }}>
                    Management Platform
                  </Box>
                </Typography>
                
                <Typography 
                  variant="h5" 
                  sx={{ 
                    mb: 4,
                    opacity: 0.9,
                    fontWeight: 300,
                    maxWidth: '90%'
                  }}
                >
                  Streamline academic operations with our comprehensive university management solution. 
                  Built for efficiency, designed for excellence.
                </Typography>
                
                <Stack direction={{ xs: 'column', sm: 'row' }} spacing={2}>
                  <Button
                    variant="contained"
                    size="large"
                    endIcon={<ArrowForward />}
                    onClick={() => navigate('/dashboard')}
                    sx={{
                      background: 'white',
                      color: theme.palette.primary.main,
                      borderRadius: 3,
                      px: 4,
                      py: 1.5,
                      fontSize: '1.1rem',
                      fontWeight: 600,
                      boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
                      '&:hover': {
                        background: alpha('#fff', 0.9),
                        transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
                        boxShadow: '0 12px 48px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)'
                      },
                      transition: 'all 0.3s'
                    }}
                  >
                    Launch Dashboard
                  </Button>
                  
                  <Button
                    variant="outlined"
                    size="large"
                    startIcon={<PlayCircle />}
                    sx={{
                      borderColor: 'white',
                      color: 'white',
                      borderRadius: 3,
                      px: 4,
                      py: 1.5,
                      fontSize: '1.1rem',
                      fontWeight: 600,
                      '&:hover': {
                        borderColor: alpha('#fff', 0.8),
                        background: alpha('#fff', 0.1)
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    Watch Demo
                  </Button>
                </Stack>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
            
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box
                sx={{
                  position: 'relative',
                  zIndex: 1,
                  display: { xs: 'none', md: 'block' }
                }}
              >
                <Box
                  sx={{
                    position: 'relative',
                    width: '100%',
                    height: 400,
                    background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${alpha('#fff', 0.1)} 0%, ${alpha('#fff', 0.05)} 100%)`,
                    borderRadius: 4,
                    backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)',
                    border: `1px solid ${alpha('#fff', 0.2)}`,
                    overflow: 'hidden'
                  }}
                >
                  {/* Dashboard Preview */}
                  <Box sx={{ p: 3 }}>
                    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, mb: 3 }}>
                      {['#f50057', '#4caf50', '#ff9800'].map((color, i) => (
                        <Box
                          key={i}
                          sx={{
                            width: 12,
                            height: 12,
                            borderRadius: '50%',
                            bgcolor: color
                          }}
                        />
                      ))}
                    </Box>
                    
                    <Grid container spacing={2}>
                      {[1, 2, 3, 4].map((item) => (
                        <Grid item xs={6} key={item}>
                          <Box
                            sx={{
                              height: 80,
                              bgcolor: alpha('#fff', 0.1),
                              borderRadius: 2,
                              border: `1px solid ${alpha('#fff', 0.2)}`
                            }}
                          />
                        </Grid>
                      ))}
                    </Grid>
                    
                    <Box sx={{ mt: 3, height: 120, bgcolor: alpha('#fff', 0.05), borderRadius: 2 }} />
                    
                    <Box sx={{ mt: 2, display: 'flex', gap: 1 }}>
                      <Box sx={{ flex: 1, height: 40, bgcolor: alpha('#fff', 0.1), borderRadius: 1 }} />
                      <Box sx={{ flex: 2, height: 40, bgcolor: alpha('#fff', 0.1), borderRadius: 1 }} />
                      <Box sx={{ flex: 1, height: 40, bgcolor: alpha('#fff', 0.1), borderRadius: 1 }} />
                    </Box>
                  </Box>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Stats Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 8, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {stats.map((stat, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={6} md={3} key={index}>
                <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
                  <Box
                    sx={{
                      width: 80,
                      height: 80,
                      borderRadius: '50%',
                      background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${stat.color}22 0%, ${stat.color}11 100%)`,
                      display: 'flex',
                      alignItems: 'center',
                      justifyContent: 'center',
                      margin: '0 auto 16px',
                      border: `2px solid ${stat.color}33`
                    }}
                  >
                    <Box sx={{ color: stat.color, fontSize: 32 }}>
                      {stat.icon}
                    </Box>
                  </Box>
                  <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                    {stat.value}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary">
                    {stat.label}
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Features Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 12, bgcolor: 'background.default' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 8 }}>
            <Typography 
              variant="h2" 
              fontWeight="bold" 
              gutterBottom
              sx={{ fontSize: { xs: '2.5rem', md: '3rem' } }}
            >
              Everything You Need
            </Typography>
            <Typography 
              variant="h5" 
              color="text.secondary" 
              sx={{ maxWidth: 600, margin: '0 auto' }}
            >
              Comprehensive tools to manage every aspect of your academic institution
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {features.map((feature, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={index}>
                <Card
                  sx={{
                    height: '100%',
                    borderRadius: 4,
                    boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)',
                    transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                    border: `1px solid ${alpha(theme.palette.divider, 0.1)}`,
                    '&:hover': {
                      transform: 'translateY(-8px)',
                      boxShadow: `0 20px 48px ${alpha(feature.color, 0.15)}`,
                      borderColor: alpha(feature.color, 0.3)
                    }
                  }}
                >
                  <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
                    <Box
                      sx={{
                        width: 60,
                        height: 60,
                        borderRadius: 3,
                        background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${feature.color} 0%, ${alpha(feature.color, 0.7)} 100%)`,
                        display: 'flex',
                        alignItems: 'center',
                        justifyContent: 'center',
                        mb: 3,
                        color: 'white'
                      }}
                    >
                      {feature.icon}
                    </Box>
                    
                    <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                      {feature.title}
                    </Typography>
                    
                    <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
                      {feature.description}
                    </Typography>
                    
                    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mt: 2 }}>
                      <TrendingUp sx={{ fontSize: 16, color: feature.color, mr: 1 }} />
                      <Typography variant="caption" fontWeight="medium" color={feature.color}>
                        {feature.stats}
                      </Typography>
                    </Box>
                  </CardContent>
                </Card>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Benefits Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 12, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={8} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                Why Choose Our Platform?
              </Typography>
              
              <Stack spacing={3} sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
                {[
                  { icon: <Speed />, title: 'Lightning Fast', desc: 'Optimized for performance and speed' },
                  { icon: <Security />, title: 'Enterprise Security', desc: 'Bank-level security and data protection' },
                  { icon: <Cloud />, title: 'Cloud Native', desc: 'Access anywhere, anytime on any device' },
                  { icon: <TrendingUp />, title: 'Scalable', desc: 'Grows with your institution\'s needs' }
                ].map((benefit, index) => (
                  <Box key={index} sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start' }}>
                    <Avatar
                      sx={{
                        bgcolor: alpha(theme.palette.primary.main, 0.1),
                        color: theme.palette.primary.main,
                        mr: 3,
                        width: 48,
                        height: 48
                      }}
                    >
                      {benefit.icon}
                    </Avatar>
                    <Box>
                      <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                        {benefit.title}
                      </Typography>
                      <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                        {benefit.desc}
                      </Typography>
                    </Box>
                  </Box>
                ))}
              </Stack>
            </Grid>
            
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box
                sx={{
                  position: 'relative',
                  bgcolor: 'background.default',
                  borderRadius: 4,
                  p: 4,
                  boxShadow: '0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)'
                }}
              >
                <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
                  Trusted by Leading Institutions
                </Typography>
                
                <Stack spacing={3} sx={{ mt: 3 }}>
                  {[
                    { name: 'Global University', students: '15,000+', courses: '300+' },
                    { name: 'Tech Institute', students: '8,500+', courses: '200+' },
                    { name: 'State College', students: '12,000+', courses: '250+' }
                  ].map((uni, index) => (
                    <Box
                      key={index}
                      sx={{
                        display: 'flex',
                        alignItems: 'center',
                        p: 2,
                        borderRadius: 2,
                        bgcolor: alpha(theme.palette.primary.main, 0.03),
                        border: `1px solid ${alpha(theme.palette.divider, 0.1)}`
                      }}
                    >
                      <Avatar sx={{ bgcolor: theme.palette.primary.main, mr: 2 }}>
                        {uni.name.charAt(0)}
                      </Avatar>
                      <Box sx={{ flex: 1 }}>
                        <Typography variant="body1" fontWeight="bold">
                          {uni.name}
                        </Typography>
                        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, mt: 0.5 }}>
                          <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                            <People sx={{ fontSize: 12, verticalAlign: 'middle', mr: 0.5 }} />
                            {uni.students} students
                          </Typography>
                          <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                            <LibraryBooks sx={{ fontSize: 12, verticalAlign: 'middle', mr: 0.5 }} />
                            {uni.courses} courses
                          </Typography>
                        </Box>
                      </Box>
                      <Star sx={{ color: '#ffb300' }} />
                    </Box>
                  ))}
                </Stack>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Testimonials Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 12, bgcolor: 'background.default' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 8 }}>
            <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
              What Our Users Say
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="h5" color="text.secondary">
              Join thousands of satisfied administrators and faculty members
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4} key={index}>
                <Card
                  sx={{
                    height: '100%',
                    borderRadius: 4,
                    boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)',
                    border: `1px solid ${alpha(theme.palette.divider, 0.1)}`
                  }}
                >
                  <CardContent sx={{ p: 4 }}>
                    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 3 }}>
                      <Avatar
                        sx={{
                          bgcolor: theme.palette.primary.main,
                          mr: 2,
                          width: 56,
                          height: 56
                        }}
                      >
                        {testimonial.avatar}
                      </Avatar>
                      <Box>
                        <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold">
                          {testimonial.name}
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                          {testimonial.role}
                        </Typography>
                      </Box>
                    </Box>
                    
                    <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary" sx={{ fontStyle: 'italic' }}>
                      "{testimonial.text}"
                    </Typography>
                    
                    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', mt: 3 }}>
                      {[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => (
                        <Star key={star} sx={{ color: '#ffb300', fontSize: 16 }} />
                      ))}
                    </Box>
                  </CardContent>
                </Card>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          py: 12,
          background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${theme.palette.primary.dark} 0%, ${theme.palette.primary.main} 100%)`,
          color: 'white',
          position: 'relative',
          overflow: 'hidden'
        }}
      >
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }}>
            <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
              Ready to Transform Your Institution?
            </Typography>
            
            <Typography variant="h5" sx={{ mb: 6, opacity: 0.9, maxWidth: 600, margin: '0 auto' }}>
              Join leading universities already using our platform to streamline their operations
            </Typography>
            
            <Stack direction={{ xs: 'column', sm: 'row' }} spacing={3} justifyContent="center">
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                size="large"
                endIcon={<ArrowForward />}
                onClick={() => navigate('/dashboard')}
                sx={{
                  background: 'white',
                  color: theme.palette.primary.main,
                  borderRadius: 3,
                  px: 6,
                  py: 1.5,
                  fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
                  '&:hover': {
                    background: alpha('#fff', 0.9),
                    transform: 'translateY(-2px)'
                  },
                  transition: 'all 0.3s'
                }}
              >
                Get Started Now
              </Button>
              
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                size="large"
                sx={{
                  borderColor: 'white',
                  color: 'white',
                  borderRadius: 3,
                  px: 6,
                  py: 1.5,
                  fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  '&:hover': {
                    borderColor: alpha('#fff', 0.8),
                    background: alpha('#fff', 0.1)
                  }
                }}
              >
                Schedule a Demo
              </Button>
            </Stack>
            
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mt: 4, opacity: 0.7 }}>
              No credit card required  14-day free trial  Full support included
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Footer */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 6, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                <School sx={{ fontSize: 32, color: theme.palette.primary.main, mr: 1 }} />
                <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight="bold">
                  UniManage
                </Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                 2024 University Management Platform. All rights reserved.
              </Typography>
            </Grid>
            
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'flex-end', gap: 2 }}>
                <IconButton>
                  <GitHub />
                </IconButton>
                <IconButton>
                  <Twitter />
                </IconButton>
                <IconButton>
                  <LinkedIn />
                </IconButton>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default HomePage;
